name: Diana The Dentist
description:
Diana the Dentist

Diana the Dentist is a surreal click and drag puzzle game in which you have to rearrange teeth!

You play as Diana, a 12 year old girl who lives in a world much like ours at a first glance but in reality is much much surreal than ours, almost like you're in a dream. So what does a bored 12 year old living in a dream world do for fun? Rearrange people's teeth of course! But just because she lives in a dream world doesn't mean all manners go out the window. Her sister Erica finds out and tells her to rearrange the poor victims' teeth back to the correct order.

That's where you come in dear player, taking the role of Diana and rearranging everyone's teeth. They all wait patiently for you in a waiting room, sad looks on their faces since they want the pain of their rearranged teeth to end. Click on one, and be brought to an up close and personal view of their mouth as you click and drag their teeth in the correct position. They'll let you know if it's in the right place or not.

Game is best played in fullscreen. Instructions:

Click to start the game once on the title screen. Once in waiting room, click on a head to be brought to their mouth. Click and drag teeth to move them, and use the scroll wheel to push them deeper into the mouth or pull them closer to you. There is a pie timer on the top left corner lasting 7 minutes. Whether you win or lose, click to exit back to the waiting room once you have won or lost. To return to the waiting room before that, hit the spacebar.
